summary: This document is an email chain from July 20, 2020, discussing the scheduling of a 'brass meeting' for the prosecution team. The sender is identified as the Deputy Chief of the Public Corruption Unit at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York. The emails reference attached prosecution memos and submissions, indicating coordination on the case.

persons.name: Deputy Chief, Public Corruption Unit
persons.context: The sender of the initial email scheduling a 'brass meeting' for the prosecution team, working at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Email Coordination for Brass Meeting
events.description: Email chain discussing the scheduling of a 'brass meeting' for the prosecution team, with references to attached prosecution memos and submissions.

keyFacts: The communication is from the Deputy Chief of the Public Corruption Unit at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The emails discuss scheduling a 'brass meeting' for the prosecution team, indicating high-level coordination.
An attachment titled '2020-04-15, prosecution memo, with attachments.pdf' is referenced, suggesting the team was working with a detailed prosecution memorandum from April 2020.
